column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A drunken man drove a Lexus RX350 at high speed
column5: swerved and hit a central divider
column6: ------The incident happened at 12:30 pm on October 2
column7: 2020 along the corner of Street 273 and Street R11
column10: Phnom Penh. The white LexusRX350 with license plate Siem Reap 2E-7789 was driven by a drunk man.------According to sources at the scene
column12: they saw the car traveling along the road 273 direction from west to east at high speed. Due to the drunken driver apparently falling asleep
column13: it collided with the divider causing damage to two wheels
column14: but did not cause injuries.------Although the front wheel was broken
column15: the car tried to drive off for about a hundred meters before stopping.------After the accident
column16: the car was handed over by the local traffic police to the municipal traffic police to be temporarily stored at the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Traffic Office
column17: waiting for the car owner to come and settle later (*not clear if he ran away or not
column18: but the last sentence suggests he did). ------POST NEWS
